articles.title: EPIC victory for Singapore battery recycler in Hong Kong start-up business-pitch battle
articles.description: Record high 1,200 start-ups from 70 countries and regions enter the competition hosted by Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corp.
articles.content:
A Singaporean battery recycling start-up has been crowned overall winner at this year’s EPIC start-up investment competition hosted by the Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corp.
One hundred semi-finalists from 28 countries and regions gathered ... [908 chars]

articles.title: China and the risks of renewables
articles.description: Beijing’s dominance of clean energy technology offers an escape from dependence on fossil fuels—and a new kind of danger
articles.content: Since the dawn of the industrial age, energy security has been defined as a reliable supply of fossil fuels at a stable and reasonable price. The pursuit of it has seen countries invaded, regimes toppled and civil wars prolonged in repeated battles t... [17238 chars]

articles.title: Disney's lavish addition to its new cruise ship sparks fierce debate between travelers: 'We don't need this'
articles.description: Disney has long been praised for using innovative technology. But its latest announcement about its new cruise ship has sparked fierce fury from some who feel the company has gone too far.
articles.content:
Disney has long been praised for using innovative technology and immersive theming at its resorts and theme parks around the world.
But its latest move has sparked fierce fury from some who feel the company has gone too far.

articles.title: The Future of Accounting: How Technology and Outsourcing Are Changing the Landscape
articles.description: Accounting is no longer defined by ledger entries and manual reconciliations. The profession is moving through a period of structural change driven by two forces: rapid advances in technology and the steady rise of outsourcing. Together, they are altering how finance teams operate, how decisions are made, and how organizations manage compliance and resilience. Routine […]

articles.title: GoDaddy hit with $170 million patent verdict over web-design tech
articles.description: (Reuters) -Internet domain registrar GoDaddy owes a patent owner $170 million for violating its rights in website-building technology, a Delaware federal jury said in a verdict made public on Friday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) -Internet domain registrar GoDaddy owes a patent owner $170 million for violating its rights in website-building technology, a Delaware federal jury said in a verdict made public on Friday.
The jury agreed with Express Mobile that GoDaddy's... [1104 chars]

articles.title: Pentagon revamps how the military buys weapons
articles.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said Friday the Pentagon is revamping how the military buys weapons, shifting the focus away from producing advanced and complex technology and toward products that can be made and delivered quickly.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON — Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said Friday the Pentagon is revamping how the military buys weapons, shifting the focus away from producing advanced and complex technology and toward products that can be made and delivered quickly.
Hegset... [4968 chars]

articles.title: Satish reaffirms fast-track development under Omar
articles.description: * NC vows to transform Nagrota: Shamim Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Nov 7: Continuing its campaign for the upcoming bye-elections in the Nagrota Assembly constituency, the Jammu and Kashmir National Conference (NC) reaffirmed its commitment to fast-tracking all long-pending development projects to transform Nagrota into a model constituency. A series of public meetings were held in Mathwar and Bhalwal areas, led by  Satish Sharma, Minister for Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affaris, Transport, Science & Technology, Information Technology, Youth Services & […]
articles.content:

articles.title: Quantum Computing Explained: Unlocking the Future of Quantum Technology and Its Impact
articles.description: Quantum computing explained: Discover how quantum computers work, their impact across industries, and the future of quantum technology reshaping the world of computing.
articles.content: Quantum computing is an emerging paradigm in computingthat leverages the principles of quantum mechanics to process information in fundamentally new ways. Unlike classical computers that use bits encoded as 0s or 1s, quantum computers employ quantum ... [6282 chars]

articles.title: Putin's new 'doomsday' 120mph nuclear sub with 'unlimited' firing range shows he thinks he's a 'maverick'
articles.description: Putin has revealed a nuclear submarine with missiles more powerful than the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima in 1945, with advanced stealth technology and an 'unlimited firing range'
articles.content:
Putin has revealed a nuclear submarine with missiles more powerful than the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima in 1945, with advanced stealth technology and an 'unlimited firing range'

articles.title: Dr Jitendra announces slew of measures, land compensation for border people
articles.description: Leads Vande Mataram march on Zero Line Avtar Bhat HIRANAGAR, Nov 7: Announcing a slew of measures being taken by the Modi Government for the residents of border areas, Union Minister in PMO with Independent Charge of Science & Technology and Earth Sciences Ministries, Dr Jitendra Singh today said, the Government of India has taken a decision to provide compensation to border dwellers and local residents for the land they had donated to the BSF for setting up pickets and […]
articles.content:
Leads Vande Mataram march on Zero Line
Avtar Bhat
